name: Bouncing Brudas
description:
Have a good time with your friends.

Learn how to control your mental powers by fighting your friends in the arena to claim the victory.

Bouncing Brudas is a competitive local multiplayer game up to 4 players developed in Unreal Engine 4 by Aaron Samaniego, Gabriel Marin, Joaquin Rubio, Jorge Virgos, Mario Borrajo and Conor Rogerson, all graduate students from Sheffield Hallam University.
